channel.title: A little help

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[code]public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;
c.DC++;

	if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
		// c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
		c.killerId = findKiller();
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if (o != null) {
			if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
				o.pcPoints += 4;
			c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
			if (c.isDonator == 1)
			o.pcPoints += 8;
			return;
			if (c.isExtreme == 1)
			o.pcPoints += 12;
			return;
			if (o.duelStatus == 5) {
				o.duelStatus++;
				o.KC++;
			}
		}
	}
	c.faceUpdate(0);
	c.npcIndex = 0;
	c.playerIndex = 0;
	c.stopMovement();
	if (c.duelStatus <= 4) {
		c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
	} else if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
		c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
	}
	resetDamageDone();
	c.specAmount = 10;
	c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
	c.lastVeng = 0;
	c.vengOn = false;

	resetFollowers();
	c.attackTimer = 10;
	removeAllWindows();
	c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
